alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 02 at 6:56PM CST until further notice by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Marengo and Hale Counties. .Rainfall totaling 2 to 4 inches, locally higher, is expected over the Black Warrior River basin through early Friday morning. A flood warning remains in effect for portions of the Black Warrior River. Another statement will be issued by Thursday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From late Friday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 90.0 feet, Pasture and wood lands begin to flood. Livestock should be moved to higher ground at stages above 90 feet. At 94.0 feet, Some secondary roads in the area begin to flood. Flooding of farm and pasture lands continues. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 77.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Saturday morning and continue rising to 94.0 feet Monday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 90.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
